response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement on its price. My offer for the product is $14,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the value it holds for you, which I understand to be $12,000. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and allows us to proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
